benchmark_details.name: H2HTalk
benchmark_details.overview: H2HTalk is a benchmark assessing companions across personality development and empathetic interaction, balancing emotional intelligence with linguistic fluency. It features 4,650 curated scenarios that mirror real-world support conversations.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: The primary objective of H2HTalk is to evaluate LLM companions in providing authentic, emotionally intelligent support.

data.source: Curated scenarios reflecting authentic emotional interactions developed through a rigorous data gathering and refining process.
data.annotation: Verified by independent evaluators and through crowd-voting for classification consistency.

methodology.calculation: Scores are calculated by combining multiple metrics into a unified metric using weighted averages.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in emotional intelligence and interaction quality.
methodology.validation: Human evaluation triggered for scores below a safety threshold.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: The dataset includes anonymization procedures to prevent identification of individuals.
